name: gwot-vst-rpi
description: The Geospatial Web of Things, is a project of the Institute for Geoinformatics Münster (Germany), which took place in summer term 2016. This `package.json` belongs to Virtual Smart Things Group and focuses on the Raspberry Pi, which is a part of the overall architecture. The RPi uses a conneted ultra sonic sensor to measure the water gauge and sends the data to a server for post-processing and storing. A WebClient will visualize this data as timeseries.
author: GWoT-VST-Group
